name: Premium Ball Pen
details: High-quality ball pen with smooth writing experience. Perfect for office and school use. Available in blue ink.

name: HB Graphite Pencil
details: Standard HB pencil with high-quality graphite core. Ideal for writing, drawing, and sketching. Includes eraser cap.

name: Mathematics Textbook
details: Comprehensive mathematics textbook covering algebra, geometry, and calculus. Suitable for high school students.

name: Spiral Notebook
details: 200-page spiral bound notebook with ruled pages. Perfect for taking notes in class or meetings.

name: White Eraser
details: Soft white eraser that removes pencil marks cleanly without smudging. Non-toxic and latex-free.

name: Metal Pencil Sharpener
details: Durable metal pencil sharpener with dual holes for different pencil sizes. Includes shaving container.
